entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
